title: (x) help?! / 'The Lightness of Being an Olympian': light serif - Nyte {Jan}
author: acarhuayo

comments.content:
Looks like Esta Pro, but lighter.

[http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111228/http:/www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4 "http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4")  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dstype/esta\_pro\_complete/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111228/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dstype/esta_pro_complete/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dstype/esta\_pro\_complete/")

No. It’s Nyte, custom by the same designer, Dino dos Santos.

[http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111228/http:/www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62 "http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62")
